title: Ticket #2908: condor_history -backwards should be the default
description: condor_history has a -backwards option, which scans the history file backwards. Usually,when users run condor_history, they are looking for recent jobs, so -backwards prints what they are looking for faster. We've never made any guarantees about ordering in the history file, so we will now add a -forward option, and make -backward the default.
creator: gthain
